0.6.1.name: wordpress/around-this-date-in-the-past
0.6.1.description:
[ Notas en castellano en la web ] [ Notes en catala a la web ]

It shows around this date entries/posts in the past (if they exist). It is highly customizable. By default it retreives a week around the current day 1 year ago.

IMPORTANT: If your sidebar supports the new Wordpress Widgets, you might better use the "Around this date in the past... - Widget Edition" plugin. Check-it here: [ http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/plugin/around-this-date-in-the-past-widget-edition/ ]
